CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOEL D. BERTOCCHI ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT [*25] OF DEANNE F. JONES ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOEL D. BERTOCCHI ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 10:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
